name: I Saw That
description:
In this game you must shoot saws to kill the enemies coming down at you from above. But watch out, you can kill yourself with your own saws if you're not blocking!

Buy upgrades from the shop using money you gained from previous games to help advanced through the future stages.

CONTROLS:
Z - Jump
X - Shoot
Left/Right - Move
Down - Block

Inspired by the disc gun from vlambeer.
(This game was completed within the last 48 hours of the jam
